    • Field Detail

      • IIIF_IMAGE_PARAMS_REGEX

        public static final java.lang.String IIIF_IMAGE_PARAMS_REGEX
        Regex to match any calls to images via iiif (not image information!). This includes the following capturing groups:
        • 1: region
        • 2: size
        • 3: rotation
        • 4: quality
        • 5: output format
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getIIIFImageBaseUrl

        public static java.lang.String getIIIFImageBaseUrl(java.lang.String url)
        If the given url is a IIIF image url, then return a url up to the identifier (removing all url parts starting with the region part) if no such parts exist, the original url is returned
        Parameters:
        url -
        Returns:
        the base url up to the identifier (no trailing slash)

      • isIIIFImageUrl

        public static boolean isIIIFImageUrl(java.lang.String url)
        Parameters:
        url -
        Returns:
        true if the given url conforms to a IIIF image request pattern (that is, an actual image is requested, not just image information)

      • isIIIFImageInfoUrl

        public static boolean isIIIFImageInfoUrl(java.lang.String url)
        Test whether the given url refers to a IIIF image information
        Parameters:
        url -
        Returns:
        true if the given url ends in "/info.json" which is assumed to refer to a IIIF image information
